name: Spinnortality: Soundtrack and Extras
detailed_description:
This pack of extras includes:
  • The Spinnortality soundtrack, remixed a little by the composer.
  • Scans of my handwritten notes while making the game, from its initial conception (and list of potential names) to marketing and final tweaks. (English only.)
  • "But what does it mean?: inspirations and motivations behind Spinnortality", a short document explaining the game's inspirations, and its theoretical underpinnings. (English only.)

To find the documents:
1. Right click on "Spinnortality" in your steam library.
2. Select "Properties".
3. Click the "Local Files" tab.
4. Click "Browse local files".
5. Open "Documentation".

Track list:
1. Spinnortality Theme (2:24)
2. Repetition and Noise (4:36)
3. Control (2:44)
4. Grand Designs (2:31)
5. Hibiscus (2:31)
6. Vorwaerts (3:27)
7. A Ringing (2:47)
8. Canals (3:21)
9. A Tape in the Sea (3:44)
10. Cyber Slow (3:30)
11. Gray Day (3:55)
12. Jet Lagged (4:17)
13. Midnight (1:36)

short_description: Spinnortality's soundtrack and two "behind the scenes" documents, helping you understand my development process.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: It's literally a bunch of .flacc music files and two .pdf documents.
